annotations:
consumption at sea ballast 14.0 knots on 21.5 mt / day ifo+ 0.1 mt/mgo laden 13.5 knots on 21.5 mt/day ifo + 0.1 mt/mgo port consumption working 4.0 mt ifo/day, idle 2.0 mt ifo/day eco cp speed and consumption (wog) 12.00 knots(ballast) / 11.50 knots(laden) on 15.5mt ifo 380cst
FROM SnC MARITIME SEOUL KOREA 82-2-778-0283 DRY@SNCMARITIME.COM - SS Kang

 

CLOSE LOCAL OWNERS HV : -

 

MV. PAN GRACE  (IMABARI 37K/â€™16) OPEN AT ZHOUSHAN,

-. EX DD, 30TH AUG ONWARDS

-. FF LOGGER

-. TRY ANY / PREFER PERIOD

-. BOD : LSFO ABT 400-600 MT / LSMGO ABT 50-150MT

----------------------------------------

 

MV. PAN GRACE

BUILT: IMABARI 2016

FLAG: S.KOREA

TYPE: BULK CARRIER / LOGGER

DEADWEIGHT: 37,657 MT

T. P. C. : 48.6

SUMMER DRAFT: 10.54 M

GRAIN/BALE: 46,995 CBM / 45,238 CBM

GRT /NRT: 23,173 / 12,202

LOA/BEAM: 179.97m /29.8m

CRANES: 4 X 30T / NO GRABS ON BOARD

 

SPEED-BUNKERS CONSUMPTION AT SEA:

BALLAST ABT 14.0 KNOTS ON ABT 21.5 MT / DAY IFO+ 0.1 MT/MGO

LADEN ABT 13.5 KNOTS ON ABT 21.5 MT/DAY IFO + 0.1 MT/MGO

 

PORT CONSUMPTION: WORKING 4.0 MT IFO/DAY, IDLE 2.0 MT IFO/DAY

 

ECO CP SPEED AND CONSUMPTION (WOG)

ABT 12.00 KNOTS(BALLAST) / 11.50 KNOTS(LADEN) ON ABT 15.5MT IFO 380CST + 0.1MT MGO

 

OWNERS PROVIDE VSL'S ECONOMICAL SPEED/CONS AS BELOW WITHOUT GUARANTEE BSS, AND THE MASTER ALWAYS

HAS AN OPTION TO RUN AT FULL SPEED FOR ABOUT 2 HOURS ON DAILY BASIS

FOR ECONOMIC REASONS CHARTERERS HAVE THE OPTION TO ORDER THE VESSEL TO PROCEED AT INCREASED OR

REDUCED SPEED AT ANY TIME AND FOR ANY PERIOD OF TIME DURING THIS CHARTER PARTY. IF MASTER/CHIEF ENGINEERS

FIND SUCH SPEED ADJUSTMENT WILL DAMAGE THE M/E, THE MASTER/CHIEF ENGINEER HAVE THEIR OWN DECISION TO

RESUME SAILING AT CP SPEED/CONSUMPTION AT ANY TIME DURING THE PERIOD OF THIS C/P.

 

THE VESSEL TO HAVE THE LIBERTY OF USING LSMGO/MDO FOR EXCHANGING BALLAST WATER AT SEA,

STARTING/STANDBY/STOPPING ENGINES, WHILE MANEUVERING IN SHALLOW/NARROW WATERS, CANALS, RIVERS, IN/OUT

OF PORTS AND DURING POOR VISIBILITY AND ALSO DURING MAINTENANCE WORKS, NARROW/CONFINED WATERS ETC.

THE VESSEL WILL CONSUME ADDITIONAL IFO WHEN BALLASTING/DEBALLASTING/BALLAST EXCHANGING/HOLD

CLEANNING ETC.

 

ALL ABOVE SPEED/CONSUMPTIONS ARE GIVEN UNDER GOOD WEATHER CONDITION AND CLEAN BOTTOM, SMOOTH SEA,

WITH BEAUFORT SCALE MAX WIND FORCE 4 AND DOUGLAS SEA STATE 3 (THREE, I.E. THE SUM OF WAVE + SWELL HEIGHT

UP TO 1.25 METERS),NO ADVERSE CURRENT AND NO NEGATIVE INFLUENCE OF SWELL.

 

BUNKERS SPEC:

LSFO: IF380CST-RMG380-LS ISO8217-2010, sulphur content not more than 0.50%

MGO: MGO DMA ISO8217-2010

LSMGO: MGO-DMA-LS ISO8217-2010, sulphur content not more than 0.10%

CHARTERERS UNDER THIS CP WARRANT TO SUPPLY BUNKERS TO MEET MARPOL ANNEX VI LATEST REQUIREMENTS.

BUNKER ISO 8217: 2005 FOR IFO, MGO MDA TO BE ALLOWED IN CASE ISO 8217, 2010 OR LATEST EDITION NOT AVAILABLE.

MIXING OF BUNKERS UNDER NO CIRCUMSTANCES ALLOWED.

 

BIMCO FUEL SULPHUR CONTENT CLAUSE AND BIMCO BUNKER QUALITY CONTROL CLAUSE FOR TIME CHARTER PARTIES

AND BIMCO 2020 MARINE FUEL SULPHUR CONTENT CLAUSE FOR TIME CHARTER PARTIES TO APPLY.

 

ALL DETAILS ABOUT
